name: So is this the end?
description:
So is this the end?
The eternal farewell?
On the last page of the book,
The cessation of the music,
One last breath.

I don't want to leave behind
choked words,
Unexperienced feelings,
for fear of ridicule
made of blank stares

From a heart that still beats
to another who runs away
Hold my hand,
Because there was no trip or danger,
I didn't face you

Although here in body,
No longer present.
"It is allowed to suffer"
In ways of hugs,
Who preferred to give but not receive.

I put on my strength mask,
Posture, serenity,
In front of what is expected,
Life goes on and in its wisdom,
Your certainty calls for longing.
